articles.title: Eurovision organisers double down that Ukraine cannot safely host 2023 contest - The Guardian
articles.description: UK’s chance of hosting edges closer as the European Broadcasting Union says it is in talks with the BBC
articles.content:
Britains chances of hosting Eurovision in 2023 have edged closer after the song contests organisers doubled down on its decision to keep it out of Ukraine.

articles.title: 'Desperate for approval' Prince Harry urged to 'stop giving interviews' - Express
articles.description: PRINCE HARRY has been described as 'desperate for approval' by a royal commentator over his interviews with the US media.
